website_summaries.verdict: Though pricey, this product includes some thoughtful extras to make the uncomfortable experience of an eye flush more bearable.
pros: Ergonomically designed to be comfortable during a flush
The flush can last up to five minutes
Two large bottles included with purchase
cons: Some find this product to be a bit on the pricey side

customer_reviews.title: May Have Saved My Vision
customer_reviews.text: I work on phones and tablets and I had a screen that I proving difficult to get off. While trying to lift the glass screen from the adhesive behind it the screen cracked and sent a spray of powder glass shooting toward my face. I was wearing eye protection, but still got some of the pulverized glass in my right eye. I am so glad I had this to clean out my eye. It is so easy to use you can figure it out without even being able to see it! Seriously... this product may have saved my vision.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Each bottle is ONE TIME USE
customer_reviews.text: ONE TIME USE! These things are saline in a bottle that is designed for one time use; how they justify charging this much is beyond me. It works as described but is so not worth the dollar amount. It’s my fault for not reading the fine print that you can not use these more than once, but seeing how much they charged, I assumed I’d be able to flush several times. Don’t waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Me to get rid of the hole in the eye cup
customer_reviews.text: The bottles are too big and once you open it you have the throw it away Plus the icecap is made all wrong
customer_reviews.author: horace robinson

customer_reviews.title: Very good, easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: Glad we continue to find the refills we need for the eyewash station. They're simple to use and work great. Tip: Don't buy too many ahead because they do have an expiration date to comply with.
customer_reviews.author: Charlie

customer_reviews.title: I use to wash eyes out after mowing
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality ! I'm glad I finally bought a eye wash bottle . I wash my eyes out after I mow grass .
customer_reviews.author: SD70

customer_reviews.title: SImple to use
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived on time and is very easy to use. Expiration date is 3 years away. These are great for a single use eyewash.
customer_reviews.author: Phil M.

customer_reviews.title: This is a life saver...
customer_reviews.text: I'm glad with this purchase, so very needed, also a very necessary item for keeping at home.
customer_reviews.author: Lina

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived as expected. I purchased these to serve as replacements in case we have to use the current eyewash solution we have. It's one of those things you buy hoping you never have to actually use it. I really like that they are good for 3 years, too.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Whew
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these for washing my eyes on OC day during the police academy. They were very very very refreshing to have in hand.
customer_reviews.author: Will Smith

customer_reviews.title: One time use
customer_reviews.text: Works great saved me a trip to the hospital Cap will not close once opened
customer_reviews.author: Kc g

customer_reviews.title: Great stuff!
customer_reviews.text: Really can not review this particular purchase. Someone stole it out of my truck before we were able to open the box. Apparently it it great enough that someone just had to have it. No. Seriously. Someone stole it. However, this was replacement for the system we purchased years ago. One bottle was used by our mechanic years ago and saved his eye from major damage, and the other expired so this was replacement bottles. I am ordering another set today. Again, seriously. Someone stole it. Amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Tami Q.

customer_reviews.title: Works perfectly.
customer_reviews.text: Just used it to get some glitter out of my wifes eye. Works as it is supposed to.
customer_reviews.author: Joe R.

customer_reviews.title: A must have when sanding
customer_reviews.text: Keep one of these handi in the shop and my bathroom. Instant portable eye wash.
customer_reviews.author: william weber

customer_reviews.title: Pricey eyewash solution with long life.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to replace the one at my lab that had expired, for the upcoming inspection. Thankfully, we have not used it yet to test it out or anything so I can't say whether it works well or not. What I do know is the particular pair I received doesn't expire until 2020, so it has a rather long life ahead of it. Other companies sell the same thing but only give it a year or two until it "expires". It is a bit pricey though, but I guess it has something to do with the bottle more than the solution.
customer_reviews.author: Colt

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I needed!
customer_reviews.text: I haven't had to use it yet, but I'm pleased with my purchase and feel better having this handy.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Carpenter

customer_reviews.title: Great Eye Wash
customer_reviews.text: Still in use even though came in a one-time packaging.... the bottle's solution was poured into a sterile closed-top container and used as often as needed. A fine product and happy to find this on Amazon when needed quickly from Prime.
customer_reviews.author: Amazonian Maven

customer_reviews.title: Keep near by, for every job. Your eyes will thank you!
customer_reviews.text: Used for eye emergencies, involving particles that can get in your eyes, even with the use of safety glasses. I will reorder several more bottles and keep them handy.
customer_reviews.author: Tabor Jr

product_meta.title: Plum 45981-2 Sterile Saline Eyewash Solution Bottle 500 mL, 8.5" Height, 3" Wide, 3" Length, 16.9 fl. oz, Plastic (Pack of 2)
product_meta.description: Size:1Plum 16.9 fl oz. 500ml Sterile Saline Eyewash Bottle, With Ergonomic Eyecup, Refill Bottle for Plum Eyewash Stations, Rinsing Solution for Dust - Dirt - Wood - Solvents or Oils.
feature_bullets: Pack of 2 Sterile 16.9 fl oz. (500 ml) bottles with 0.9% sterile sodium chloride (Saline) solution
Bottle has an ergonomic soft eyecup for direct rinsing onto eye. Minimum 3 year solution expiration - guaranteed
Bottle has a 5 minute flush time
